content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am willing to pay 300 euros.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 300 euros is much lower than I expected. The location and quality of my apartment justify a higher price. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I am willing to pay 400 euros.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for considering my request. 400 euros is more in line with what I had in mind. However, if you are willing to pay a little more, I might be able to offer you some additional amenities. How does 425 euros sound to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [425] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that, Yi-Nuo. With this agreement, you'll be able to enjoy all the benefits of living in a central location with a brand-new apartment. Please let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. Your help is greatly appreciated. I am looking forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Yi-Nuo. I'm sure you'll be very happy in your new home. If you have any further questions or need assistance with anything, feel free to contact me. Enjoy your stay in Magdeburg!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
